Detailed Description

Author:
Eric Crahen <crahen@cse.buffalo.edu>
Date:
<2002-05-29T17:04:50-0400>
Version:
2.2.0
A DaemonThreadFactory produces stock daemon Thread objects. These are simply returned to the caller after creation without performing any special initialization.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual ~DaemonThreadFactory (    )  throw () [inline, virtual]
 

Destroy the ThreadFactory.

Member Function Documentation

virtual Thread* create (    )  throw (Synchronization_Exception) [inline, virtual]
 

Create a new Thread. The ownership of the Thread is passed to the code that calls this function.

Exceptions:
Synchronization_Exception  thrown if a new Thread cannot be created.

Implements ThreadFactory.
